vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.15.20;
daughter of: Amram (H6019) and Jochebed (H3115);
sister of: Moses (H4872) and Aaron (H0175)
§ Miriam = "rebellion"
1) elder sister of Moses and Aaron
2) a woman of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hermana de Moisés; tribu de Leví; (b)   hija de Méred; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米利暗 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "反抗"
1) 摩西及亞倫的姊姊
2) 猶大的婦女
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米利暗 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "反抗"
1) 摩西及亚伦的姊姊
2) 犹大的妇女

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17;
daughter of: Mered (H4778)(?) and Bithiah (H1332);
sister of: Shammai (H8060I) and Ishbah (H3431);
half-sister of: Jered (H3382H)(?), Heber (H2268I)(?) and Jekuthiel (H3354)(?)
§ Miriam = "rebellion"
1) elder sister of Moses and Aaron
2) a woman of Judah
